name: AddStaticVehicle
description: Adds a 'static' vehicle (models are pre-loaded for players) to the gamemode.
params_title: (modelid, Float:spawn_x, Float:spawn_y, Float:spawn_z, Float:z_angle, color1, color2)

params_body.name: modelid
params_body.description: The Model ID for the vehicle.

params_body.name: color1
params_body.description: The primary color ID. -1 for random.

params_body.name: color2
params_body.description: The secondary color ID. -1 for random.

return_values:
The vehicle ID of the vehicle created (between 1 and MAX_VEHICLES).

 INVALID_VEHICLE_ID (65535) if vehicle was not created (vehicle limit reached or invalid vehicle model ID passed).
related_fn:
AddStaticVehicleEx: Add a static vehicle with custom respawn time.
 CreateVehicle: Create a vehicle.
 DestroyVehicle: Destroy a vehicle.
